Sentencas: A thermo-economic method for the promotion of the efficient use of exergy resources is proposed, named carbon exergy tax (CET).
Titulo: Carbon exergy tax: a thermo-economic method to increase the efficient use of exergy resources

Sentencas: It is based on the evaluation of the cost of the exergy destroyed and rejected, and connected with the CO2 emissions of an energy system.
Titulo: Carbon exergy tax: a thermo-economic method to increase the efficient use of exergy resources

Sentencas: The CET and the carbon tax (CT) formulations are both applied to different conventional energy systems, to show how the CET strongly improves the economic suitability of systems which make a better use of exergy.
Titulo: Carbon exergy tax: a thermo-economic method to increase the efficient use of exergy resources

Sentencas: Finally, the CET contribution to the widespread utilization of advanced energy systems (with the example of a solid oxide fuel cell + gas turbine plant) is presented and discussed.
Titulo: Carbon exergy tax: a thermo-economic method to increase the efficient use of exergy resources
